SELECT o.request_id AS request_id, p.product_code AS product_code, p.product_name AS product_name, o.request_qty AS request_qty, o.received_qty AS received_qty, o.defective_qty AS defective_qty, o.emp_id AS emp_id, o.create_date AS create_date FROM order_request o INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_code = p.product_code ORDER BY o.request_id DESC
SELECT request_id, product_name, request_qty FROM order_request INNER JOIN products USING (product_code)
